caption:
This photograph captures a lively scene inside what appears to be a classroom or children's library. A male adult, wearing a white robe with a red stole, indicative of a clerical or academic attire, engages with a group of children. He is kneeling on one knee and holding an open book, which he seems to be showing or discussing with the kids.

The surrounding children exhibit a variety of reactions; some are attentively looking at the book while others are engaged in different activities. The boy closest to the camera is holding a book closely, examining its content, while a girl behind him reaches out to a shelf filled with books and papers.

There are six children in total in the frame. They are dressed in typical school attire from perhaps the 1970s or 1980s based on fashion; the boys are in collared shirts and plaid pants, while the girls are in patterned dresses. The decor of the room is simple, featuring practical furniture such as wooden tables and red storage shelves which are stuffed with books and learning materials.

The background and ambient details suggest an educational setup designed for children's activities, focusing on reading and engagement. The atmosphere is casual and appears to be a moment of learning and interaction guided by an adult, possibly during a school day or a special educational program.
title: Religion plays an important part in the lives of residents. The second largest denomination of churchgoers are Lutherans. The minister at Our Savior's is shown in the church nursery school with children of the members. This church has its own mixed choir and Sunday school, and holds baptism after Sunday service.
